citations.narrative:
The chicken coop's window covering has a broken metal screen and so it does not protect them from wild animals (ie
raccoons and similar animals) having the ability to possibly get in with them. Birds' enclosures must be secure and protect
them from other animals. Ensure to repair this area to protect the chickens from other animals.
***Correct by 12/11/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

Primary enclosures. 
The chicken coop's window covering has a broken metal screen and so it does not protect them from wild animals (ie 
raccoons and similar animals) having the ability to possibly get in with them. Birds' enclosures must be secure and protect 
them from other animals. Ensure to repair this area to protect the chickens from other animals.  
***Correct by 12/11/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
